Ancestry-Minotaur -- Male Minotaur Novice Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d4-1 Spirit: d6 Strength: d10 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Tough: +1 Vigor step
Uneducated: -1 Smarts
Very Strong: +2 Strength step
Skills (12 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1 Survival: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Psionics: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Amorous: -2 on Tests vs. Attractive character
Thin Skinned+: -4 vs. Taunt
Size: 1
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 2
Description Notes: Size+1: +1 Size
Features
Edges (1 points): Fey Blood Hindrances: Amorous; Driven; Mean; Pacifist Minotaur Features: Big; Horns; Mean; Size +1; Thin Skinned+; Tough; Uneducated; Very Strong
Feature Notes:
Big: Has difficulty finding armor and clothing that fits; suffers -2 on all Trait rolls when using standard equipment
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Tunic Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d10+d4 R3"); Horns (d10+d4); Short Bow (2d6 R12"); Unarmed (d10+d0)
Combat Notes:
Horns: Horns are a natural weapon
Size+1: +1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Fey Blood: May make free reroll to resist enemy powers and spell-like effects
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option available
